name: Afference
description:
For the Spektrum Crush "Permadeath Radio" Jam.

Possible epilepsy warning.

Wander around. Touch things. Stare.

When you reach the yellow area, there is nothing left to do.

Maybe I'll expand this later.

Probably not.

Controls:

WASD to move.

Mouse to look.

Space to jump.

E to interact.

Credits:

Uses the First Person Drifter control by Ben Esposito.

Piano sample is Frank Levy playing Chopin's Op. 32 No. 1 (Nocturne No. 9 in B Major), under Public Domain license, via musopen.org. I've modified it in various ways.

Various paid & free assets from the Unity Asset Store were used/repurposed (To do: list them.)
